title: What is the attendance cut-off this year?

comments.body: In RRC there was an address given my Jawahar in which he stated that the attendance criteria is reduced to 75%,however he never came to EC campus,so there is a little bit of ambiguity regarding the situation as I myself am from ECC, probably if any RR peeps can help us out?
Our class teacher said itâ€™s 75%(im in my 4th sem)
I wish they'd reduce it even further. The late college timings is adding to the stress because of heavy traffic both in the mornings and evenings.
Literally this time change was so fckn stupid
The gag is, you're supposed to have a minimum of 75% not only for the ESA but both ISAs. Found out this morning.

I think this is absolutely ridiculous I've been studying in this college for 3 years now and have never come across such a meaningless rule,either you have heard it from the wrong sources or this college is already on its downtrend
Idk if the rule applies to all departments, but the new B.Com HOD is a waste of life

I've had like 51% and 60% and stuff in my subjects in like sem 4 and 3 and none of my subjects have ever been above 75%. None of my teachers asked me why or cared about attendance. But for CS ppl in my campus, if they have less than 85% they are asked to show some medical certificates and submit an affidavit. So it depends a lot on your HoD. For safety, keep it above 75 and if they ask you, get some fake medical certificates, they're very easy to get
Apparently this sem it's 75% attendance and they won't be taking medical certificates anymore
75% attendance is for full year or 75% in each sem?
okay, and some comment stated that 85% is minimum for cs ppl?
